turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi how can i help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you help me order beverage from Starbucks, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i sure can. which starbucks should i place the order at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm near Colorado Springs.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a cinnamon dolce latte?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a a Grande size?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get that hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great. and are you ok with whole milk, or did you want to select a different milk option?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you use 2% log, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me read the order back to you to confirm. 1 grande hot cinnamon dolce latte with 2% milk from starbucks in colorado springs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you add whipped cream to the latte, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i've added whipped cream to your order. the total is $4.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: perfect.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can you place a order, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, the coffee order has been submitted. it'll b ready for pick up in 10 mins.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've sent you the receipt via text.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. I really appreciate it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
